channel.title: "Victor-Jos√©'s Online Portfolio"
channel.description: All new certificates, jobs, projects and milestones.

item.title: Leading Research Technician, CANlab
item.short: part-time work in the The Cognitive and Affective Neuroscience Lab.
item.long: Promoted to the position as a Leading Research Technician for The Cognitive and Affective Neuroscience Lab (CANlab) at the University of Oslo (UiO).

item.title: MSc Cognitive Neuroscience (grade A)
item.short: Research degree with focus on programming, analysing and visualising brain metrics through tools like EEG and (f)MRI. Additional PHD-module in machine learning and a master thesis titled: New Insights into Adolescent 15q11.2 CNVs: A Dual Approach Using Normative Modelling and Raw Metrics.
item.long: Master program in Psychology at the University of Oslo. I recieved three grades C (5 ETC module), B(5 ETC module) and A (60 ETC thesis). In total I graduated with 125 ETCs, where an extra 5 ETCs came from the additional PHD-module I attended outside of my own curriculum.

item.title: Psychology BSc (First-Class Honors Degree 1:1)
item.short: Dissertation titled: Mental Time Travel and False Memory
item.long: This suite of Psychology programmes has a strong history of accreditation and has consistently been commended for the high-quality education and outstanding student experience by the British Psychological Society (BPS). List of Modules: - Introduction to Research Methods in Psychology - Psychological Problem Solving - Mind, Body & Brain (1 & 2) - Research Methods and Statistics (1 & 2) - Social and Developmental Psychology (1 & 2) - Psychology in the Real World - Understanding Mental Health - Perspectives on Consciousness (Single Honours Psychology only) - Individual Differences and Psychometric Research - Neuropsychology - Cognition and Emotion - Health Psychology - Topics in Adult Psychopathology - Extended Research Project

item.title: Career Essentials in GitHub Professional Certificate
item.short: Certificate provided by LinkedIn and Github.
item.long: Certificate proving a fundamental competence in Github for professional use, provided by Github and LinkedIn.

item.title: The Online Portfolio
item.long: During my hunt for work, I decided that I did not want to lose my momentum from my intense graduate program. One skill to enhance was GIthub, and somehow I ended up making my own webpage for my portfolio.
